title: Heroes of Tiny Kingdom
description: Heroes of Tiny Kingdom is a captivating idle simulation game that puts you in the shoes of a knight tasked with building a bustling settlement from scratch. With the guidance of a herald, you'll gather resources, create tools, and prepare for battle. As you progress through the game, you'll face increasingly complex challenges, from trimming sheep to crafting weapons. Earn coins and expand your island, building a castle, blacksmith, and storage facility. This game offers a peaceful yet engaging experience, perfect for unwinding after a long day.
